name: Novoland:The Castle In The Sky
description:
Novoland is the top free 3dmmorpg! Three races and six unique classes, make your choices! Different style costumes, dress up and makeup yourself to become the most fashion one in Novoland. Team up to defeat the boss and experience cross-server PVP battle. Stunning graphics, give you a fantasy open world to explore. Make best friends from world-wide, and find your true love to get married. Design your sweet home, and collect epic wings and rides. Now, it’s free to play. Are you ready to start your new adventure?

Features:
- Raids with friends: Build your team to defeat epic bosses, collect loots and level up.
- 3D Sky Fight: 360° Sky fight, dominate in the sky.
- Cross-server PVP Battle: Real-time PVP intense battles. Become the King of battleground with your strongest power and legendary weapon!
- Advanced Social System: Globalization server, make real friendship from world-wide players. Chat with voice system.
- Home Design: Build and design your sweet home, also can invite friends or lovers to visit your house.
- Six Classes: Choose your class and start the path to legendary!
- Experience Game Life: Find your true love to get married, even you can born a baby and raise with them up.
- Character Customization: Many different style of clothes, haircuts, weapon skins. Makeup and dress up yourself, create your own unique character!
